forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 5pm. Partly sunny. High near 83, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 18 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 39 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
